bahūta：a．[=pahūta] 多くの，多数の．abl．bahūtaso = pahūtaso 豊富に．

Bahūta，（adj．） [for pahūta=Sk．prabhūta] abundant，much Th．2，406 （°ratana，so read for bahuta°），435 （for bahutadhana）; J．III，425 （bahūtam ajjaṁ “plenty of food＂; ajja=Sk．ādya，with Kern，Toev．s．v．bahūta for T．bahūtamajjā，which introd．story takes as bahūtaṁ =balaṁ ajja，with ajjā metri causâ．C．expls however as mataka-bhattaṁ）; VI，173 （°tagarā mahī）; Pv．II，75 （v．l．for pahūta，cp．pahūtika）．（Page 485）
